---
name: Build and deploy my portflio to prod
on:
  push:
    branches: [ master ]
jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
          name: Build and Deploy 
          runs-on: ubuntu-latest

          steps:
            - name: Checkout
              uses: action/chekout@v2

            - name: Build
              run: npm install

            - name: Deploy
